name: Click Clack Whacked By Abram Frost
name_original: Click Clack Whacked By Abram Frost
description:
In this interactive fiction short story, you play an overzealous writer who is confronted by their inconsiderate, and noisy upstairs neighbor, over the loud click, clack, whack sound that your typewriter makes.

The hypocrisy makes you snap! Now it is up to you, the reader, to decide how you wish to react.

This story is considered finished, however, if you find any mistakes that I need to fix, feel free to let me know.
